WorkItem.ClosedComment: Ok - 'stamina' has been added to the list of buffs that can be applied to warlocks.Astrylian & Ypisetsky have already pointed out that stamina does not affect DPS calculations whatsoever, so this is purely a cosmetic effect for displaying the correct stats.
WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] Fortitude and Imp Fortitude Buffs not Showing

Comments.Message: Are you referring to Power Word: Fortitude and Improved Power Word: Fortitude? If so, those buffs are not relevant for calculating dps.
Couldn't Stam TECHNICALLY be counted as a DPS stat for Locks?
Those buffs are not relevant for calculating DPS, but they are relevant to displaying stats and calculating survivability.
